summary.span: 封装关于应用程序的安全决策。

span.span: Encapsulates security decisions about an application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信任管理器的方法返回对象 。An object is returned by a trust manager's method.

param.name: fullTrustAssemblies
param.span: 一组强名称，表示在应用程序域中应被认为完全受信任的程序集。

span.span: An array of strong names that represent assemblies that should be considered fully trusted in an application domain.

summary.span: 使用提供的授予集和完全信任程序集的集合，初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fullTrustAssemblies` 标识中 要被授予完全信任的具有强名称的程序集。`fullTrustAssemblies` identifies strong-named assemblies within the that are to be granted full trust. 此构造函数由方法调用， 用于创建 将用作沙盒的。This constructor is called by the method to create an that will be used as a sandbox. 有关在沙盒中运行应用程序的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在沙盒中运行部分受信任的代码](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox)。For more information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](/dotnet/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox).
